sentences.en: At times he might even deign to speak to them.
sentences.cn: 有些时候,他也以恩赐的神情同他们谈谈话.

sentences.en: He did not deign to an answer.
He did not deign to reply.
He did not even deign to glance at me.
He doesn't deign to acknowledge his old friends.
He doesn't deign to talk to unimportant people like me.
sentences.cn: 他不肯屈尊和像我这样不重要的人说话.

sentences.en: I fear my Julia will not deign my lines.
sentences.cn: 我担心我的朱莉亚不会欣然接受我的书信.

sentences.en: I would not deign to comment on such behaviour.
Nor would we deign him burial of his men ( Shakespeare )
sentences.cn: 我们也不愿答允他埋没他的部下 ( 莎士比亚 )

sentences.en: She would not deign to speak to us.
sentences.cn: 她认为她不值得和我们说话.

sentences.en: Special deign is the maze - design subassembly to prevent leakage.
sentences.cn: 特别的是有 迷宫式 组件来防止泄漏.

sentences.en: They would never deign to notice me.
sentences.cn: 他们决不会屈尊来注意我.

sentences.en: Travis called after her, but she didn’t deign to answer.
sentences.cn: 特拉维斯在后面叫她，但她不肯屈尊应一声。

sentences.en: Welcome wholeheartedly new and old customers in the world your patronage, deign to inquire, direct.
sentences.cn: 竭诚欢迎世界各地的新老客户惠顾 、 垂询 、 指导!
您不屑赐予回答 吗 ?

trans.tran_en: to do something that you think you are really too important to do – often used humorously
